tool_description: Calculates distance and travel time matrices between all waypoint pairs using road network data for route optimization.

origins.description: Array of origin coordinates in 'latitude,longitude' format

destinations.description: Array of destination coordinates in 'latitude,longitude' format

travel_mode.description: Transportation mode: driving, walking, cycling, or transit

error_messages: Matrix size exceeded: Maximum 25x25 matrix supported (625 origin-destination pairs).
Invalid travel mode: Use driving, walking, cycling, or transit.
Invalid units: Use metric or imperial.
Invalid departure time: Use ISO 8601 date-time format.
Unreachable destinations: Some origin-destination pairs have no valid route.
usage: Provide arrays of origin and destination coordinates with travel mode and units. Returns comprehensive distance and time matrices.

distance_matrix.description: Flattened distance matrix as array of 'origin_index:dest_index:distance' strings

duration_matrix.description: Flattened duration matrix as array of 'origin_index:dest_index:duration' strings

matrix_dimensions.description: Matrix size in format 'origins_count x destinations_count'

calculation_summary.description: Summary of matrix calculation including any failures
